page.title: 20Yealmpton Community Assoc.
page.content: Over the past two decades, as the population of the village has grown significantly, the need for some sort of community building has become evident. Recently groups of interested villagers have got together in an attempt to motivate enthusiasm and investigate the possibility of getting a Community Hall.On Friday April 26th 1985{the Yealmpton Community Assoc. celebrated it's inauguration with a dinner at the W.I.Hall.The Association was formed to research, fund and organise the building of a community hall. This will be long project and the first two major tasks are fund raising and selection of a viable site {**** CREDITS **** Co-ordinator-Mrs Breeze; Computer Work Mrs Holbrook; Contributers-Mrs Fogwill Mr Breeze,Mrs Apperly & the Children of Yealmpton School.
